title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field5.
OB: When searching for references to a field in an external jar, the search results are not being selected.
EB: The search results should be selected when searching for references to a field in an external jar.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have source for rt.jar).
2. Open java.io.File.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Observe that the search results are not being selected.
